title: Nijisanji Fan Comics
description:
Various fan comics related to Nijisanji.
1. An adaptation of the [url=https://youtu.be/3QZpEOSN9u0?t=3581]final fight of bracket A[/url] in the Nijisanji Delusional Tournament. [url=https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/24372469]Author's Pixiv.[/url]
2. [url=https://twitter.com/kuroseP]Goblin Slayer's mangaka[/url] depiction of the final battle in the [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3QZpEOSN9u0]Nijisanji delusional tournament[/url]
3. Depicts Suzuhara Lulu after her and her colleagues' concert at Zepp Namba.[url=https://twitter.com/jinusi822] Author's Twitter.[/url]
4. [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FI_PKPuyO4Y]Based on a conversation between Debidebi Debiru and Suzuhara Lulu.[/url][url=https://twitter.com/negiyuki_fan][url=https://twitter.com/negiyuki_fan] Author's Twitter.[/url]
5.[url=https://twitter.com/Vtuberfanart] Author's Twitter.[/url]
6. Based on [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WCb56zgn6_g]this[/url] collab. [url=https://twitter.com/Vtuberfanart]Author's twitter[/url]
7. The title refers to a line from [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kyxSZovr9fY&feature=emb_logo]this song[/url] of theirs. [url=https://twitter.com/oribiyo] Author's Twitter.[/url]
8. Based on a [url=https://twitter.com/g9v9g_mirei/status/1237300098754732032]tweet[/url] from Gundou Mirei. [url=https://twitter.com/hkcm_ksk]Author's Twitter.[/url]
9. [url=https://twitter.com/ponjiyuusu]Author's Twitter.[/url]
11. [url=https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/86222537]Source.[/url] [url=https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/993574]Author's Pixiv.[/url]
12. [url=https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/5657960]Author's Pixiv.[/url] [url=https://twitter.com/misononasubi?lang=en]Author's Twitter.[/url]
13. [url=https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/5657960]Author's Pixiv.[/url] [url=https://twitter.com/misononasubi?lang=en]Author's Twitter.[/url]
